name: Ayushi Pasricha
about: A dynamic and result-oriented professional and team manager, with 12+ years of experience in working with industry leaders. Skilled in category management, merchandising, inventory management, private label and brand management, and operations in startups as well as a mature organization. Passionate about growing brands and delivering innovative, sustainable, and customer-centric solutions that enhance the shopping experience and drive business results.
